typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SK_systemuserid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_systemuserid as string,
		fullname as string,
		parentsystemuserid as string,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
source(output(
		SK_systemuserid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		fullname as string,
		manager as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWH
source(output(
		SK_systemusermanagerid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_systemusermanagerid as string,
		fullname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG2
STG derive(DWHHASH = crc32(512,upper(toString(fullname)),upper(toString(parentsystemuserid)))) ~> STGHASH
Join1, DWH lookup(STG@SK_systemuserid == DWH@SK_systemuserid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(DWH@HASHKEY),
	DWH@HASHKEY!=STG@HASHKEY,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
STGHASH, STG2 join(parentsystemuserid == BK_systemusermanagerid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_systemuserid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		fullname as string,
		manager as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HASHKEY = DWHHASH,
		fullname = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@fullname,
		manager = SK_systemusermanagerid,
		SK_systemuserid = ConditionalSplit1@Nuevos@SK_systemuserid
	)) ~> sink1
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_systemuserid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		fullname as string,
		manager as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SK_systemuserid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SK_systemuserid = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@SK_systemuserid,
		HASHKEY = DWHHASH,
		fullname = ConditionalSplit1@Actualizaciones@fullname,
		manager = SK_systemusermanagerid
	)) ~> sink2
